original_text: The workers are already bringing in the fruit and their master is paying them. As a result, people are receiving life for ever with God. So the person who plants the seeds will be very happy. And the person who brings in the fruit will also be very happy. Both of them will be happy together.
korean_text: 거두는 자가 이미 삯도 받고 영생에 이르는 열매를 모으나니 이는 뿌리는 자와 거두는 자가 함께 즐거워하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: The workers are already bringing in the fruit
and their master is paying them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 주인이 그들에게 삯을 주고 있네

sentences.original_text: As a result, people are receiving life for ever with God
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과 사람들은 하나님과 함께 영원한 생명을 얻고 있어

sentences.original_text: So the person who plants the seeds will be very happy
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 씨를 뿌리는 사람은 매우 기쁠 것이라

sentences.original_text: And the person who brings in the fruit will also be very happy
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 열매를 거두는 사람도 매우 기쁠 것이라

sentences.original_text: Both of them will be happy together
sentences.korean_translation: 그 둘이 함께 기뻐하게 될 것이다
